foreach

Iterate over the key value pairs of either an array-like object or a dictionary like object.

API

foreach(object, function, [context])

```js var each = require(‘foreach’);

each([1,2,3], function (value, key, array) { // value === 1, 2, 3 // key === 0, 1, 2 // array === [1, 2, 3] });

each({0:1,1:2,2:3}, function (value, key, object) { // value === 1, 2, 3 // key === 0, 1, 2 // object === {0:1,1:2,2:3} }); ```
